properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , NAME , GENDER , MEMBER_LEVEL , REGIST_DATE , EXTEND_YN , EXPIRY_DATE FROM SP_MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , NAME , GENDER , MEMBER_LEVEL , REGIST_DATE , EXTEND_YN , EXPIRY_DATE FROM SP_MEMBER WHERE NAME = ?
UPDATE SP_MEMBER SET EXPIRY_DATE = ? , EXTEND_YN = 'Y' WHERE NAME = ?

INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE ( EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , EMP_NO , EMAIL , PHONE , DEPT_CODE , JOB_CODE , SAL_LEVEL , SALARY , BONUS , MANAGER_ID , HIRE_DATE , ENT_DATE , ENT_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_EMP_ID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , NULL , DEFAULT )
